column1: The mon locus on zebrafish Chromosome 8 is also predicted to be syntenic to the region of human Chromosome 1p that contains the TIF1 gamma gene based on the conserved locations of 12 other orthologous gene pairs, including NRAS, mapped to these regions in human and zebrafish ( Barbazuk et al. 2000).

column1: The PM and ER were probed using mouse anti - Na + / K + - ATPase ( Upstate, Waltham, Massachusetts, United States) or rabbit anti - calnexin ( Stressgen Biotechnology, Victoria, British Columbia, Canada) antibodies and the secondary antibodies, Cy3 - conjugated goat anti - mouse ( 1: 200; Jackson ImmunoResearch, West Grove, Pennsylvania, United States) or AlexaFluor 594 - conjugated chicken anti - rabbit ( 1: 200) respectively.

In non - BC individuals there was significant ( p < 0. 01) correlation between CEBPG and eight of the 16 antioxidant or DNA repair genes, specifically XRCC1, ERCC5, GSTP1, SOD1, GPX1, ERCC1, CAT and ERCC2 ( Table 4).

The following primary antibodies were used: E2f - 1 ( SC - 193), E2f - 3 ( SC - 878), Cdkn1a ( p21, SC - 471), Cdkn1b ( p27, SC - 528), Pou4f2 ( Brn3b, SC - 6062), and Tfdp1 ( Dp1, SC - 610) from Santa Cruz Biotechnology ( http: / / www. scbt. com), pRB ( 554136) from BD Science - Pharmingen ( http: / / www. bdbiosciences. com), and Slc18a3 ( VAChT, G448A) from Promega ( http: / / www. promega. com).
